localizeInCorner() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Localizer
Assumes that the robot is positioned in a corner of two walls on the playing field, between the corner and the grid point (1,1).

Base localizer class that can read distances, color light values, and has a distance scanning method.

localNavigation - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.menu.CalibrationMenu
The navigation instance local to this class, constantly being updated by various calibration methods, based on an updated BASE_WIDTH and WHEEL_RADIUS from LocalResources.
LocalResources - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
